tns:patch.author: Alex Gartner
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_activity_pledges;
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_activity_pledges_title AS SELECT DISTINCT ac.amp_activity_id, cv.category_value as pledge_title ,fp.id AS pledge_id, cv.id AS title_id FROM amp_funding_pledges fp JOIN amp_category_value cv ON cv.id = fp.title JOIN amp_funding_detail fd ON fd.pledge_id = fp.id JOIN amp_funding fu ON fd.amp_funding_id = fu.amp_funding_id JOIN amp_activity_version ac ON fu.amp_activity_id = ac.amp_activity_id WHERE ac.amp_team_id IS NOT NULL AND ac.deleted <> true AND ac.draft <> true;;
